Class Schematic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.moomoohk.Grame.Basics.Schematic

  • public class Schematic
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a collection of Walls which is arranged in a certain pattern.

    2013-04-05
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Meshulam Silk (moomoohk@ymail.com)
